alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 10:03PM EDT until March 26 at 3:58AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following creek and location in Indiana... Sugar Creek near Edinburgh. .Excessive rainfall continues to drive area waterways higher, and this is pushing Sugar Creek at Edinburgh into flood. The water level is expected to continue rising overnight. At present it is forecast to crest slightly over 1 foot above flood stage, but later forecasts likely will differ from this initial prediction. Please stay abreast of the latest conditions by monitoring further information from the National Weather Service and local media. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sugar Creek near Edinburgh. * WHEN...From this evening to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, In Johnson county, CR 400 S east of US 31, CR 725 E north of CR 400 S and Greensburg Road from CR 700 E to CR 800 E are closed by flood waters. Low agricultural land is flooded. A few homes and outbuildings surrounded by high water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EDT Friday the stage was 10.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 PM EDT Friday was 10.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.1 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
